name: Woocommrece Product Attribute on Cart
author: Asif Ali

sections.description:
Description: This plugin will Add Product Attribute On Cart Page in Woocommrece.

Feature

  • This plugin will Add Product Attribute On Cart Page in Woocommrece.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder “product-attribute-on-cart” to “/wp-content/plugins/” path.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress backend
  3. After activating the plugin, product attribute will automatically add on cart page.
  4. Enjoy!
sections.changelog: This is first version with no known errors found
